derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (also denoting astrology): from Old French astronomie, from Latin astronomia, from Greek, from astronomos (adjective) 'star-arranging'

entry.def: Astronomy is the scientific study of the stars, planets, and other natural objects in space.
